Package environnement

States, Actions and Game Rules.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Action Minimal behavior of a generic Action.
Contraintes The game's rules : Gives the list of possible actions from a given state.
State Methods for a Generic State.
TileAbleContraintes When the problem can be solved with tiling
 

Class Summary
AbstractContraintesSolitaire  
AbstractState Wrapping Interface State and define some common behaviors.
ComposedAction A container of elementary µAgent actions
ElementaryMultiAgentContraintes This kind of Contraintes is only able to produce a list of possible actions : all other computations are made inside a µAgentContraintes
Filter  
ListeActions A place to put actions : used when looking for the liste of possible moves.
 

Package environnement Description

States, Actions and Game Rules. All of this must be instantiated for each given problem or game.
